data.text:
Founded in 2003, K1 Speed is North America's premier indoor electric kart racing company. With over 59 Centres world wide, K1 Speed has now expanded north of the boarder with its first Canadian location in Toronto, Ontario, and second in Mississauga, Ontario and is set to bring all the thrills and excitement that has become synonymous with the K1 brand to the Canadian market. Located in beautiful Downsview Park, this 47,000 sq. ft. facility is home to the finest indoor karting experience not only in the GTA, but throughout Canada. Guests enjoy the latest in karting technology with state-of-the-art environmentally-friendly electric go karts and experience the thrill of authentic open-wheel racing on a professionally designed road-style course featuring the most sophisticated track barrier safety system available. Though the racing is spectacular, equally impressive is the facility itself, which features museum-quality racing decor, nightclub-style lighting, and a sophisticated K1 Lounge where guests can enjoy delicious food and beverages in between racing sessions. Whether you visit for Arrive-and-Drive drop-in racing, or are planning to host a corporate event or party, K1 Speed is sure to be the perfect fit for your entertainment needs. Visit www.k1speed.ca today for more information on all of our available services.
